name: Katina Saga: Terror Aboard the Hermes Redux
name_original: Katina Saga: Terror Aboard the Hermes Redux
description:
Katina is back in another exciting adventure.  Five years have passes since the Incident on Rigel-2, and Katina, Rachelle, Hu-Man, and Xander have resumed a normal life on the Hermes. That will soon come to an end when a mysterious being decides

that the Hermes must pay for the Federation's past indiscretions. The being unleashes a terror on the Hermes that could prove to tear the ship and everyone aboard apart. 

Part 2 of the ongoing Katina Saga.
